mapper.select:
select
from base_user_role where #{0} LIKE concat(cancat('%',#{1}),'%')
select ur.fuid,ur.userid,ur.roleid,ur.modifydate,r.realname from base_user_role ur,base_role r where r.fuid=ur.roleid and ur.userid=#{userid}
